body_text:
What are the differences between Ash and Red? In Pokémon, we have two main characters:

Red, who is the main protagonist on the manga and the first Pokémon games (Red, Blue and Yellow)
Ash, who is the main protagonist on the anime.

What are the differences between the two?

Is Gary also Blue? So we have this question about the character Red vs Ash.
It made me start wondering if your rival in the game (red/blue), or if he appears in the manga, is different from Gary.  So are Gary and Blue the same?  If not, what are the major differences?
